event: received first dose of inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine

illness progressed over the following 4 days
faint erythematous non'itchy rash over torso
no consumption of raw dairy products
reported taking one dose of antibiotic
systolic blood pressure of 110 mm Hg
